com.teamten.math

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamten.math.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends Object
    Immutable matrix class. Represents each element as a double. All transformation matrices assume column vectors. In other words, a transformation matrix M will transform a column vector v by pre-multiplying it: M*v.

      • make

                          int rowCount,

      • makeUnit

        public static Matrix makeUnit(int size)
        Make a unit sizexsize matrix.

      • makeWithBasis

        public static Matrix makeWithBasis(Vector x,
                                   Vector y,
                                   Vector z)
        Make a 4x4 matrix with the three vectors as the basis vectors: x is the first row, y the second row, and z the third row. The bottom-right element is 1. When a vector is transformed by this matrix, the input vector will be considered to be in world space, and the transformed vector will be in the basis space.

      • makeTranslation

        public static Matrix makeTranslation(Vector t)
        Make a 4x4 translation matrix with the given translation.

      • make4x4

      • multiply

        public Matrix multiply(Matrix other)
        Return the product of the two matrixes (this times other).

      • transform

        public Vector transform(Vector vector)
        Transforms the vector by the matrix. The input vector is pre-multiplied by the matrix. The input and output vectors are column vectors and have the same number of dimensions. The matrix must be square. It may have the same size as the vectors, or be one larger, in which case a "1" is added to the input vector and removed from the output vector.

      • transformVector

        public Vector transformVector(Vector vector)
        Transforms a vector (rather than a point). Only the direction is transformed. Only works on 4x4 matrices and 3-size vectors.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns a string like "|1,2,3|\n|4,5,6|\n|7,8,9|" with no newline at the end.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • toString

        public String toString(String indent)
        Returns a string like "|1,2,3|\n|4,5,6|\n|7,8,9|" with "indent" at the front of each line and no newline at the end.

      • getInverse

        public Matrix getInverse()
        Returns the inverse of the matrix. Only works on 4x4 matrices.

      • getDeterminant

        public double getDeterminant()
        Returns the determinant of the matrix. Must be a 4x4 matrix.
